name: ConnectionDetection
description:
Made for the GMTK GameJam2021 under the Theme "Joined Together".

The Game ConnectionDetection is a small Puzzle Game that relies on connecting different components to light the target on the end of the level to progress.

Credits:
Programming: Dotlof, ErloZim

Level Design: Dotlof

Graphics: ErloZim

Music: ErloZim

Check Out ErloZim:

https://dab-nation.itch.io/
